translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

I inform Your Excellency, Ensign Ferreira of the 5th Corps of National Guards, of the anarchists recently taken prisoner at the Chapel: Cândido Machado de Sousa, Sebastião Gomes, Francisco Machado, João Rodrigues, Inácio Furtado, Manuel José dos Santos, Feliciano Francisco, lieutenant of the rebels, and Francisco José do Nascimento Júnior; the latter was released and handed over to Dr. Fagundes by an order of Your Excellency.

May God preserve Your Excellency
Barracks in the Prisons of Battalion 11, November 26, 1840.
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir
Tomás José da Silva
Marshal Commander of the Garrison.
Antônio Pedro de Abreu
Lieutenant Commander of the Prisons of Battalion 11.
